{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E3000 |revision=v1 |upc=745883589432 |serialnum_prefix=CVQ0 |asin=B003B48UQ8 |est_release_date=03/31/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E3000,Q87-WRT610NV2 |fcc_date=01/04/2010 |ic_id=3839A-E3000 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4718A1 |cpu1_cspeed=480 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, |serial=yes,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4718A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4322 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, TomatoUSB, Tomato RAF (Victek), Tomato (Shibby) |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=68:7F:74,98:FC:11,C0:C1:C0 |oui_eth=68:7F:74,98:FC:11,C0:C1:C0 }} {{TagLine|High Performance Wireless-N Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E3000}} <!--{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_E3000_v1.0}}--> E3000 serial numbers appear to start with '''CVQ0'''. *"3763-40300105R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *"3763-40300108R" may be silkscreened on some production boards. {{see also|Linksys WRT610N v2|CyberTAN}} UPCs.. *E3000 (retail model) is 745883589432 *E3000-RM (refurbished model) is 745883590322
